website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, this is a beautiful QLED TV with the latest technology. It's a worthy investment in home entertainment for those who don't mind the high price tag.
pros: Amazing picture quality in a versatile 65-inch screen that will easily become the focal point of any room
Has Ambient Mode, so it can blend into decor with personalized images when not in use
9 Series model offers state-of-the-art HDR tech that appears to bring screen images to life
cons: You'll pay a lot more than similar QLED TVs for the 9 Series model
Some tech issues that required tech rep visits noted

website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Q9 is an amazing performer with exquisite design and loads of extras, but it costs more than OLED TVs and doesn't perform as well.
pros: The Samsung Q9 has the best overall picture quality of any non-OLED TV I've reviewed, with exceedingly bright highlights, inky black levels with minimal blooming and best-in-class off-angle and bright-room performance
Its innovative design makes hiding wires and stashing gear easy, and includes a unique Ambient mode that helps it blend into your decor when the TV is "off
cons: More expensive than OLED TVs with superior image quality
Bixby can't compete with Alexa or Google Assistant

customer_reviews.title: One of the best LCD TVs you can buy but the price.....
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this TV except the price. Excellent picture quality that rivals OLED and the innovative One Connect box make this TV a knock out. What I don't like is the price considering that the new Vizio P Quantum is available for $1700 which is roughly half the price of the Samsung Q9FN. The Vizio offers nearly identical picture quality at half the price. I purchased the Samsung less than a month ago and I feel like I got cheated. Oh well....
customer_reviews.author: J. Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Very very happy
customer_reviews.text: This 2018 Samsung Q9F was worth waiting for. Beautiful color, brightness, sharpness and contrast. The black level is as beautiful as my prior LG OLED (2016) which I had to retire due to the unsightly “logo” burn-in it suffered from not changing the channel frequently. So, if you’re a marathon tv watcher that wants a gorgeous picture without needing to worry about burn-in, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Florence H

customer_reviews.title: Waste Of Money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time buying this product from Samsung the T.V has a really bad defect with the screen it will work for a little bit and as soon as you get comfortable with $3,000 T.V there goes the full array back lighting lighting messing up witch pretty much makes the T.V unwatchable. Don't buy this T.V
customer_reviews.author: Lance Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Learn to ship as started on box
customer_reviews.text: Was damaged couldn’t install. Could see through packing that the screen was cracked
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME QLED SAMSUNG TV!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an AWESOME smart TV, I LOVE IT!! I highly recommend it, as I use to work for Philips TV back when flat screen TV's were first launched, so I know a high quality product. I have a bright room with lots of light, the QLED has minimal light reflection as the plasma or OLED would have had too much. Perfect picture, very easy to setup and VERY high quality product...especially since the price dropped recently to $1499! Also Vanns the distributor that get these sets from Samsung was very helpful when I called to ask questions and was trying to purchase directly from them, but Amazon does their distribution and delivery for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Eggerichs

customer_reviews.title: Picture!?  All I can say is WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: There are no superlatives to adequately describe this TV. The picture quality is superb. The connect box is superb. Setup is a bit bizzare, from my perspective. When I connected the cablebox and went through the setup the only choices I had were Directv and Dish. Or not listed. But after going through setup (fumbling through). I found spectrum then the remote worked fine for the cable box. The feet (tv stand) are a huge PITA to take off! We bought the samsung wall mount after. I love that mount!
customer_reviews.author: Barb/Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great TV and, Service
customer_reviews.text: After a year I have 2 dead pixels working with Samsung to get them to come out and, service it. Put its been pretty great other then that picture quality is one of the best in market and, I own a Oled has well so best of both worlds. I use it has my gaming TV and, a pc monitor. Abt Electronics where great my first shipment was damaged they where fast to get me a replacement within a week. Mrs. Brown sales representative was great still to this day I can ask her a question she's quick to get back to me. I would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Obed Blas

customer_reviews.title: I install AV gear as part of my career
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth every penny. The hands down BEST TV I have owned. The Ambient mode setup works on SOME TABLETS AND PHONES but is buggy on some. Overall exactly what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Maier

customer_reviews.title: It's got a purdy picture
customer_reviews.text: Gave 4 stars but it's really a 5....want you folks to take this review from an average Joe seriously. Set up was super easy, assembly was super easy, and the picture is amazing. Now I cant tell the difference between 1080p and 4k, never have, but again the picture is gorgeous! Follow rtings's calibration recommendation and you won't be disappointed. The only issue I have is when you turn on the tv it starts playing one of Samsung's apps. I haven't looked into shutting it off yet, so hopefully it's possible. If you have $1500 sitting around definitely buy this tv. If that's too rich for ya get the Sony 900f (my bedroom tv is the 900f and it's great).
customer_reviews.author: P H.

customer_reviews.title: Picture is unreal
customer_reviews.text: Makes new and old movies look fantastic. Had a high end 6 year old HD plasma, this is on another level. Super dark scenes on Netflix and Amazon can look strange and very dark as the local dimming software struggles.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture; dumb TV
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with actual vs advertised features. Ambient mode does not function as described - the iOS smarthings app is awful and will not allow photo to be taken/uploaded. The ability to control external devices with one remote is also broken. I specifically purchased a new Samsung UHD Blue Ray player, but spent an hour on the phone with tech support only to have them tell me the One Remote capability doesn’t always work. Disappointed that this new “smart” tv is less smart than my Samsung F8000 from 2013
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Beard

customer_reviews.title: Best picture quality we've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased several Samsung and Mitsubishi televisions and this is the best picture quality we've ever had. Only negative things would be the price and the software that's on the TV is kind of buggy and does not keep settings properly.
customer_reviews.author: Geek

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the remote.
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware. Ordered this TV which is flawless q9 is great black is black not gray and the color depth is deep and rich. Glare on the tv is minimal. But buyer beware they try and give you the black plastic remote that comes with the lower end led tvs. This remote is suppose to be metal. Picture to compare.**
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: impressive TV
customer_reviews.text: Spent quite a while looking/reviewing both samsung and LG TV... OLED, vs QLED. I finally went and looked at both side by side. While the LG seemed to have a small advantage with reviews, in person there was no question the samsung looked better (and was less expensive). So I got a 75" for less than a 65" LG and again (in my opinion) a better performing TV. Brighter by far and the blacks are "almost" the equal of the OLED. Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: viperamd64

customer_reviews.title: The Best TV money can buy even better than the Q90R
customer_reviews.text: The Best TV ever for HDR Gaming, Movies, and Shows Even HD and SD look wonderful with the HDR+ Mode on Local Dimming on High and Contrast Enhancer on Low with Ratings 2 point 20 point and color settings Backlight 50 Brightness at 0 Contrast 50 Sharpness 10 Color 30 Took about 40 minutes to set up and calibrate everything to my liking but its the best picture money can buy even better than the 2019 sets
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product quality - faulty panel and no recourse from Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware -- Awful experience with Samsung and their 3rd-party tech-support. Screen promptly failed a couple of months after 1-year warranty expired -- After wasting my time for a diagnostic visit (which amounted to taking pictures of the screen, something I could have done). Quoted cost of repair for panel and other parts was over $2K. Rendering repairs pointless. Completely lost faith in Samsung's product quality and durability. Will never buy from Samsung again.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Al-Fares

customer_reviews.title: q9 best picture I have seen
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the qled Q6 and that was horrible I’d figure spending 2k for a tv is a lot when the tv is off the screen is blurry and hurts to look at it so then I returned that tv headache free thanks to amazon and bought the Sony 900f that was a little better then. The q6 I did some more reviews because I still wasn’t happy what 2500 got me then I decided to try the q9 what a night and day difference if your getting a qled don’t try to save money because your going to be disappointed go with the q9!!! Hands down best picture ever!! Hope this helps some people save time!
customer_reviews.author: Artgambaryan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful TV. The imagery at 4k is stunning! The controller is well made. The location and placement of the batteries is unique and I don't have to worry about ever having to tape up the cap, ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose I Sorto Jr

customer_reviews.title: Crisp color definition
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic TV, just need for content providers to switch from HD to UHD. Picture is stunning. It’s almost too bright. One connect box is simple to setup even with sound bar through arc hdmi it was all plug and play with the box recognizing my inputs.
customer_reviews.author: Teker9

customer_reviews.title: great TV great store
customer_reviews.text: great TV.. have Sony oled and Samsung.. both great.. some shows better on oled and some better on Samsung q9fn.. I've learned there is no best TV.. but these 2 are about as good as it gets.. I ordered from store called audo and video store out of California from Amazon.. can't recommend this store enuff.. best customer service of all stores I have ordered from.. stores like this especially Rose from customer service don't exist anymore.. this is the last of the great ones left.. I know I buy a lot of electronics will be buying from this store only.. can't recommend enuf.. thank you Rose for all your help.. if you happen 2 read this..
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for 2019
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! Awesome size TV perfect for our 600sq ft living room. Picture quality are great, easy set up and if miss placed the remote, no worries if you have Samsung phone just download smart things and it works fine 👌. Happy customer 😃
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: The most impressive TV I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is phenomenal! The one-connect box makes connecting peripherals beyond simple. The new remote has a very sleek modern, simplistic design and is a pleasure to use. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a top of the line smart TV.
customer_reviews.author: Wm. Lynn Ethridge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV
customer_reviews.text: I have had this TV for about 2 weeks now and as of yet I have no complaints about it. The picture is super clear, black levels are spot on. Out of the box the color saturation seemed a bit high but after changing the TV's settings to those recommended at RTINGS.com everything seems dialed in just right. I chose the one year old model over its 2019 predecessor the Q90 for two reasons: The Q90 has less dimming zones for which online reviews seemed to show more blooming because of this and the price. It took awhile but I was eventually able to find the Q9FN discounted quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Donald V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I would buy from this seller again. The picture is amazing. The price was perfect. It's a major upgrade from my last TV. I shopped every TV out there and I'm happy with my purchase especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: No power, defective.  Amazon failed to state this new tv was no longer under warranty.  Outrageous.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the last one of these models, new. Unpacked it, made all the connections, and NO POWER!! Called Samsung support, tried all of their suggestions to no avail. They said they could send a technician to check it out, but I'd have to pay a service charge because the tv was no longer under warranty, a fact which amazon never mentioned in the listing of this item. Outrageous. I'm returning this defective tv.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.

customer_reviews.title: The tv I always wanted
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted this tv as I 4K game. Honestly color and contrast will blow you away. And brightness. Only thing is I already have the q6fn and for the price difference I cant say its worth it to upgrade if you already have a QLED tv. If you don’t it is worth it. It’s a difference between this tv and all the other TVs out there but there is no premium “it” thing for the premium price. Just better color color contrast and brighter than any tv I’ve seen on market. It’s flagship, just in performance only. Would have liked design difference or interface difference. Dope tv though! Won’t be disappointed I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Increadible picture and easy control
customer_reviews.text: Samsung out did itself. Have 4 Samsung TV's (76" to 82") with oldest being 4 years and newest being 1 year. The difference is out of this world. The color, no screen reflection, single tiny line that does power and communications, tiny remote (easy to lose) that is so easy to use. Have not found one negative to say about this TV. Want the 90" for the living room now.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My only criticism is with Samsung not the service and quality of the TV you provided. Samsung is marketing the ability to blend the background of the tv with your wall in ambient mode by taking a picture of the tv and wall with the “smartthings” app. Unfortunately, this feature doesn’t work and it has been reported many times in various forums on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: It’s great TV beautiful picture really happy with the purchase. The only problem I have is the remote control is not the silver one (smart remote) call the amazon and they put me through Samsung, they will send me the remote.
customer_reviews.author: MH-30

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous TV nearly OLED at half the Price
customer_reviews.text: Using this TV in an art gallery to display professional photographs alongside of high end large format color prints. It holds its own in comparison. HD to actually turn down the brightness to avoid overdoing it versus the real prints nearby. When one dies that, at first glance they look similar. Colors are terrific and blacks are black.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Boger

customer_reviews.title: Samsung service is non existent and they say tough luck!!!
customer_reviews.text: my tv is expensive tv with no way to get someone to service it because there is not a service center in our area. the tv is a year and half old and keeps giving us a black screen after about an hour viewing. Samsung should advise the customers to not buy anything in areas that are more the 40 miles to a certified service center. Now I have a tv that is no good and it was supposed to be the best thing on the market. NEVER BUY SAMSUNG AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie F. Craig

customer_reviews.title: I love Samsung TV's!
customer_reviews.text: I love Samsung TV's! This TV was not the highest priced with most advanced features, but it had what I needed for an exceptional large TV viewing experience, that with a nice surround sound sound audio device also. I also really like the ease of set up with Samsungs, they are very user friendly in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Honesty!
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering purchasing this TV because of the promotion to pay it off in 12 months with monthly payments of $233.33 with no interest, Amazon fails to tell you that the full amount will be deducted from your account that day. I wish they'd been more transparent there.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriane Morris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Q
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tv size and picture. Easy set up great features and company hand delivered and took packaging away. Recommend this tv and this company that delivered from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: What a picture!
customer_reviews.text: When picking our TV we were torn between OLED type TV and QLED. I like the samsung interface and tech much easier to use. Love the flush wall mount. It comes with a One box you will connect all your cables using that box. Love the easy remote
customer_reviews.author: W. Carreras-scarola

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last- Look Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 15 months ago and the panel is already dying with 4 inches of vertical lines showing up along the left side. Of course this is right after the 1 year warranty is expired. This is the second samsung TV to go bad way too soon (my 2014 panasonic viera is still going strong). Will not touch another Samsung TV.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Wong

customer_reviews.title: The Tv was delivered yesterday!
customer_reviews.text: We're ok now. The TV was delivered yesterday and I paid my bill on March 18th. My architect and his wife will have the TV for the ranch and the summer may be delightful. By the way, we live in San Miguel de Allende. Google it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: can only connect it to power via connect one system...please do not buy and waste your money like I did.....ALSO DID NOT WORK DAY ONE OUT OF THE BOX!! COMPANY WILL NOT TAKE IT BACK AND IM STUCK WITH WASTED TIME GETTING A BRAND NEW TV FIXED...WORST PURCHASE OF MY LIFE AND I SUGGEST YOU AVOID THIS TV AND VANNS!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice TV
customer_reviews.text: Has a great picture. The controls and settings are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tony M

customer_reviews.title: I got this TV at a respectable price.
customer_reviews.text: The tv itself is a little more complicated adjusting to your picture likings but once you hit it, a great tv for watching movies, sports and super for gaming. I'm satisfied. The only issue I have is the amount of reflection on the screen during dark scenes, best to leave the lights dimmed or off.
customer_reviews.author: Howard P.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: After months of reading reviews and watching you tube I got this TV. Unreal.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best TV
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Best in market. Best purchase I’ve ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Clean look, looks great and works well so far!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture clarity, smart features, now streaming 4K UHD from a previously limited selection.
customer_reviews.author: NotProvided

customer_reviews.title: It amazes me everytime I turn it on!! WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing in bright rooms with minimal glare. Super bright and sharp at night. Amazing dark contrast...no glow/hallow effect. I love this TV!!! Simply the best!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Love the picture!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful picture. Samsung is by far the best in it’s class. The TV is a little pricey, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: gina Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Bright for rooms with big windows and Good for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Had few hiccups with remote loosing pairing with tv in beginning but been phenomenal. Darks and blacks are neck to neck with OLED quality. Connected with Alexa to turn On and Off and auto switches connection to HDMI when PS4 turned on. Only thing I don’t use is voice control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Got this TV for an awesome price! Used it to replace a perfectly functioning 1080p Plasma. The picture quality is amazing and the TV itself is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Great Tv despite the late arrival!!
customer_reviews.text: The Tv did arrive a day and a half late which was very concerning because no one could tell me exactly where the tv was. However, once it arrived the tv was great. Picture quality with 4K content is simply amazing! It also upscales lower resolution pretty well. Definitely recommend this tv over the Q90R.
customer_reviews.author: LaJuan

customer_reviews.title: No issues!  Great price!
customer_reviews.text: OK...it was too big for me to set up alone so I called a couple of GEEKS and got er done!
customer_reviews.author: HoustonBob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent colors and vibrancy
customer_reviews.text: Loved the easy set up and the screen colors are vibrant and crisp
customer_reviews.author: Victoria C Penneman

customer_reviews.title: Does it get any better than this?
customer_reviews.text: QLED is the only way to go with all the features that Samsung has to offer.... What a picture to behold!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Angert

customer_reviews.title: Screen uniformity not good.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth the loads of money. The screen uniformity at this price range should be perfect But it is not. Terrible product. Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this TV so far It has met or exceeded our expectation
customer_reviews.author: PAUL D.

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Tv does not work. The screen does not illuminate. Samsung forum members report faulty power supplies in these TVs.
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful work of art!
customer_reviews.text: My TV is everything I hoped it would be. The picture is phenomenal, the smart features are great. I have had no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Pulliam

customer_reviews.title: Picture exceeds my oled c8
customer_reviews.text: Stunning picture. Excellent sound is a bonus. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rg11782

customer_reviews.title: Hassle of set-up and replacement.
customer_reviews.text: TV screen was cracked on delivery. Returned for credit and purchased replacement locally.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Performance
customer_reviews.text: Amazing 4K, easy to navigate, remarkable color control, built-in tutorials. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: francisco ayala

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful picture and design.
customer_reviews.text: Wonder TV. Great picture, a breeze to set up, practically does everything for you. Would highly recommend for anyone looking for a top of the line non-OLED tv. P.S. It does not play well with the Bose 300 Soundbar. Pretty much have to run optical only.
customer_reviews.author: Deana P.

customer_reviews.title: Tv professionally installed (after waiting almost a month for delivery) ...
customer_reviews.text: Tv professionally installed (after waiting almost a month for delivery) and tv won’t turn on. Called seller and they said “not our problem, you have to call Samsung”. Called Samsung, gave me email address to send proof of purchase and have to wait 48 hours (with no confirmation that my email received) to hear back. Whole thing unsettling, never buy Samsung product or from this seller again!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Great product prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love just about everything this tv does Best picture quality ever. Especially love the 1 box connection with option to mount on wall to hide wires in wall leaves a clean viewing look for the room. The 1 connect box makes it easy to add components Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: William Kime

product_meta.title: Samsung 9 Series 65" Smart TV, QLED 4K UHD 2018 Model
product_meta.description: More than a billion shades of our most phenomenal quantum color and our best full array backlighting redefine luxury viewing. Exquisite design with clutter-free cabling and Ambient Mode transform TV into a purposeful canvas. *Mount sold separately.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Samsung 9 Series 65” QLED 4K UHD Smart TV, 2018 Model, One Remote TM1890A with batteries, One Power Cable, One User Manual
TV dimensions: Without Stand – 57.1” W x 32.7” H x 1.5” D. With Stand – 57.1” W x 34.1” H x 14.4” D. Display size: 64.5" Measured Diagonally, Resolution 3,840 x 2,160. TV weight: 58.9 lbs

The pinnacle of QLED innovation with our best Direct Full Array LED and an anti-reflective screen delivers our most pristine detail and depth and our maximum High Dynamic Range experience is engineered exclusively for the Q9 to deliver our most premium picture

With our new Ambient Mode, you can elevate your living room with decorative content, useful information, your own photos, and even some background music; You won’t notice the TV on the wall as it blends perfectly with your décor

Get an excellent sound with Dolby system. Q9 TVs offer a great sound quality with a built-in woofer and a speaker type of 4.2CH. Capable of Multiroom Link and TV Sound Connect. Also supports Bluetooth Headset Support

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
